channel.title: Open Contracting: COVID-19 Action Research Grants
channel.description:
I noticed that the Open Contracting Partnership (cc @James_McKinney) have published a [guidance page and request for proposals](https://www.open-contracting.org/what-is-open-contracting/covid19/) relating to $3,000 action research projects on procurement data and COVID-19
Alongside the current guidance and discussions of how best to use the IATI Standard, would we expect to also see something similar from "IATI" (board / secretariat / data use task force / publishers / donors), perhaps?
